findings.rationale: A five-year duration for confidentiality obligations may be excessive and could hinder business operations or partnerships beyond a reasonable timeframe.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without posting bond increases the risk for the Receiving Party, as it may lead to immediate and potentially unjustified restrictions on their operations.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restricting assignment of the agreement may limit flexibility for both parties in the event of changes in ownership or restructuring.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
